alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:17AM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...A mixture of freezing rain and sleet with ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch on elevated surfaces. * WHERE...Washington OK and Nowata Counties. * WHEN...Ice accumulations begin early Saturday morning and precipitation ends by early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Bridges and overpasses in the advisory area may become slick and hazardous due to icing. Also, any icing on power lines combined with gusty northerly winds may locally stress the power grid. Isolated power outages may develop.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
